details: A hands-on workshop promoting sustainable energy solutions. Over 200 students participated in building solar-powered models.
An online seminar featuring industry experts discussing how Artificial Intelligence can contribute to solving global challenges.
A 48-hour hackathon encouraging innovations for social impact. The winning team developed an app to assist visually impaired users.
A month-long campaign including webinars, competitions, and guest lectures aimed at improving cybersecurity knowledge among students.
A celebration of women engineers and technologists, featuring keynotes, panel discussions, and networking sessions.
Organized a national-level conference focused on technological contributions to climate action. Attended by delegates from 15 universities.
